*** Bug 64009 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

verified in code that catchupWithProjectionAnnotationModel does not throw IAEs
any longer. Other methods may still throw IAEs.

Marking as verfied as there is no reproducible case and we haven't see these
exceptions since when it was fixed.
